Posts.Content: everlue wrote: I am scheduled for surgery May 29.  Dx DCIS and decided on radical mastectomy.  I had no ideal that there were so many different types of bc.  A good start for board would be to inform the types too?  I thought bc was bc and now have found out there are at least 15 different types.  What an education? Dx 5/13/2008, DCIS, 6cm+, Stage 0, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: May surgery everlue wahine
